properties.name: zoneminder.default-storage
properties.description: Default location to search for if an event does not link to a storage entry.

properties.name: server.cors.allowed-origin-patterns
properties.description: Patterns of allowed origins for CORS.

properties.name: server.media-roots
properties.description: Base URL to fetch media from for each storage location. Use `default` to set the location when no storage is specified.
